meta.description: Common OKR anti-patterns with detection rules and reframing strategies

anti_patterns.name: Activity-Based Objectives
anti_patterns.description: Objectives that describe what you will do instead of what change you will create

contextual_rules: Objective starts with action verb focused on creation/implementation
Contains technology or process nouns without outcome context
No stakeholder value or business impact mentioned

questions: What change will this create for users/customers?
What problem does this solve?
How will success be measured?
What value will stakeholders receive?

example_transformations.after: Empower customers with self-service capabilities that reduce support burden
example_transformations.explanation: Shifted focus from building technology to customer empowerment and business outcome

example_transformations.after: Transform sales efficiency through improved customer relationship insights
example_transformations.explanation: Changed from system implementation to sales performance transformation

anti_patterns.name: Unmeasurable Key Results
anti_patterns.description: Key results that cannot be objectively measured or lack specific targets

contextual_rules: Contains improvement words without specific numbers
Uses relative terms without baseline or target

questions: What is the current baseline?
What specific target represents success?
How will this be measured?
What data source will track progress?

example_transformations.after: Increase customer satisfaction score from 7.2 to 8.5 (NPS methodology)
example_transformations.explanation: Added specific baseline, target, and measurement methodology

example_transformations.after: Reduce average support ticket response time from 24 hours to 4 hours
example_transformations.explanation: Specified what response time, current state, and target improvement

anti_patterns.name: Business-As-Usual Objectives
anti_patterns.description: Objectives that describe normal operational activities rather than stretch goals

contextual_rules: Objective focused on maintaining status quo

questions: What improvement opportunity exists?
How could we create additional value?
What would breakthrough performance look like?
What challenge or opportunity are we not addressing?

example_transformations.after: Accelerate revenue growth through expanded market penetration
example_transformations.explanation: Shifted from maintenance to growth-focused value creation

example_transformations.after: Transform customer experience into competitive advantage
example_transformations.explanation: Changed from service maintenance to differentiation strategy

anti_patterns.name: Too Many Key Results
anti_patterns.description: Having more than 5 key results per objective, diluting focus

contextual_rules: More than 5 key results listed for single objective
Lack of prioritization among key results

triggers: Mix of unrelated metrics in single OKR

questions: Which 3-5 results are most critical for the objective?
Can some results be combined or moved to separate OKRs?
What are the leading indicators vs lagging indicators?
Which metrics directly measure objective success?

example_transformations.before: 7 key results covering revenue, costs, quality, speed, satisfaction, compliance, and training
example_transformations.after: 3 key results focusing on revenue growth, customer satisfaction, and operational efficiency
example_transformations.explanation: Consolidated related metrics and separated concerns into focused OKRs

anti_patterns.name: Sandbagging with Easy Targets
anti_patterns.description: Setting key results that are too easy to achieve, lacking appropriate ambition

contextual_rules: No stretch or challenge in the metrics
Historical performance suggests targets are easily achievable

triggers: Increase revenue by at least 2% (when industry growth is 15%)

questions: What would breakthrough performance look like?
What's the industry benchmark or best practice?
What would represent a significant achievement?
How can we stretch beyond comfortable targets?

example_transformations.after: Accelerate revenue growth to 12% through market expansion
example_transformations.explanation: Set ambitious but achievable target based on market opportunity
